attributes.action: Ban fireworks with sound and just have silent
attributes.additional_details: The loud bangs and noise from fireworks causes real stress and trauma to wildlife and family pets also war veterans and children and the elderly. In some cases death.
attributes.background: Make fireworks with noise being sold illegal. Only silent fireworks for sale.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700223
